sub_topic: Prove that every group of order 6 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C6 or the dihedral group D3.
message_1: Let G be a group of order 6. Prove that G is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C6 or the dihedral group D3. Determine which group is isomorphic to G by finding all the possible subgroups for G and checking their properties.
